title: Sweet Corn 🌽 Chat 😀 || Evening Snack
content:
North Indian Recipe: Sweet Corn 🌽 Chat Servings : 2 Duration : 15 mins Chat is a savory snack popular in India 🇮🇳 originated from Uttar Pradesh. It can be prepared with many ingredients and mainly contains onion, tomato, coriander, lemon juice and spices. Chat is easily available as a snack in restaurants and famous dish in street food. One of my favorite Evening snack is chat. I love to eat chat a lot ☺️ Nutrition facts of sweet corn: Vitamin : C Minerals : Iron & manganese  Today I prepared sweet corn chat which is simple and quick recipe with less ingredients. Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Boiled sweet corn 🌽 - one bowl - 235 gms Finely chopped - Onion - 1/4 cup Finely chopped - Tomato 🍅 - 1/4 cup Coriander - chopped - 1/4 cup Salt - 1/2 teaspoon Red chilli Powder - 1/2 teaspoon Chaat Masala Powder - 1/2 teaspoon Ghee / Butter - 1 teaspoon Lemon juice - 1 teaspoon Sev - 2 tb sp Procedure: Boil sweet Corn:
  • Boil 2 cups of water in a bowl and add 1/2 teaspoon of salt
  • When water started boiling add raw sweet corn 🌽
  • Close it with lid and cook 5 mins
  • Turn off burner/cook top
  • Let it become cool
  • Drain water and take out boiled sweet corn in a cup
Preparation of Sweet corn chat:
  • Take a bowl
  • Add chopped onion, tomato and coriander
  • Add salt, red chilli Powder, chaat Masala Powder, ghee and lemon juice
  • Mix well
  • Add boiled sweet corn 🌽 and mix well
  • Garnish with sev
  • Sweet corn chat is ready to serve
  • Have it on weekends / evenings/ winter ❄️
  • Happy cooking 😀
